thread.title: Ex-CIA Head Leon Panetta: Seemed Like Trump Forgot He Was President When He Spoke at CIA
thread.title_full: Ex-CIA Head Leon Panetta: Seemed Like Trump Forgot He Was President When He Spoke at CIA

author: Josh Feldman
title: Ex-CIA Head Leon Panetta: Seemed Like Trump Forgot He Was President When He Spoke at CIA
text:
Ex-CIA Head Leon Panetta: Seemed Like Trump Forgot He Was President When He Spoke at CIA by Josh Feldman | 8:06   video 
Former CIA Director Leon Panetta criticized President Trump for talking about the “dishonest” media as he spoke at CIA headquarters on Saturday. 
Panetta told Wolf Blitzer on CNN earlier tonight that the particular venue Trump went off-the-cuff at was really not the appropriate place: 
“I was concerned about the remarks that he made at the CIA in front of that wall. That wall contains the stars of CIA officers who’ve given their life for this country. That’s as close as you can get to hallowed ground at the CIA. It’s the equivalent of speaking at Arlington Cemetery.” 
He said Trump needs to understand that he’s president now and “doesn’t have to spend time embellishing himself.” 
Panetta acknowledged that it’s sometimes hard for people to get out of campaign mode and move on to governing, but said, “I just got the impression that when he was speaking there he forgot he was President of the United States.” 
Watch above, via CNN.
